resources.string: Select numbers vertically, horizontally or diagonally. Score when distinct set of three consecutive numbers forms a valid arithmetic equation. Two out of three numbers must be greater than 10.

For addition and subtraction, score=log10(operand1)+log10(operand2)+log10(result). For multiplication and division, score=(log10(operand1)+1) x (log10(operand2)+1) x (log10(result)+1). The score is then multiplied by the current chain number.
